==  Infinitives ==

In *infinitives*, there is no primary subject dependency, but the logical subject is in some cases encoded with a subject filler dependency. See our analysis of [http://copenhagen-dependency-treebank.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/#raising raising and control] and our analysis of the special pronoun [http://copenhagen-dependency-treebank.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/nounsT.html#at-pronoun 'at'].
